HTTP Zoom ([httpzoom.com](http://www.httpzoom.com)) a HTTP Simple brand.

We have, for several years, provided premium quality hosting, VPS and dedicated services. Our aim is to now bring that same level of quality and customer support into the Lowend Market place.

**How are we different from the rest?**
1) We have a long track record in making our customers happy
2) We already have existing infrastructure being used from our parent company, who have been successful since 2007.
3) We use enterpise hardware for our lowend platform. How many others are using 15k SAS drives in Raid 10!!

We want to sell some Xen VPS and to do this we've SLASHED our prices by 50% for a limited time only.

**USE CODE "highxensale"**

Our VM15 plans all feature the following:
Premium UK Datacentre
Enterprise Level 15k SAS Drives in Raid10
Xen Platform
CPU Fair Share
100mb shared port
SolusVM Control Panel


**Special Offer**

VM15 - C - UK
Price £7.50 / Month (With discount £3.75 / Month)
Price £60 / Year (with discount £30.00 / year)
512MB Dedicated Ram
1024MB Swap
20GB Diskspace
400GB Transfer

[Order Here](https://billing.httpsimple.com/cart.php?systpl=zoomnew&a=add&pid=33&carttpl=singlepage)
